name: Death of Magic
description:
In a city struggling to survive an ever increasing lack of magic, a young woman will find herself faced with the decision of overthrowing or becoming ruler of an empire. Will Jackin take her place on the Alsvoran throne, or overthrow the Dragon, end the reign of magic, and bring about a new era?
The choice is yours.

Death of Magic is a visual novel about justice, revolution, and dragons. As you guide Jackin through the story you'll be faced with decisions to make - who to talk to, who to trust? While this demo is just a snippet of the story, you'll eventually choose between marrying the new Queen, or siding with the dissidents and supporting the revolution.

The demo features animated sprites, a custom soundtrack, and an all Australian voice cast. We're really proud of how it looks and sounds, but in order to finish the game to this same level of polish we're going to need further funding. If you haven't already, please check out our Patreon page (patreon.com/tyandae) and consider donating. All income goes directly to game development.
